extendedInfo.description: *No Ads version available*http://slideme.org/application/betandsurebetcalculatornoadsStop loosing money...with the most complete bet calculator:- Now with support of all odd formats (EU, UK, US)- SureBet (arbitrage) calculator with advanced features you won't find anyware in the market. You can use this tool for 3-way, 2-way surebets and also for back-lay surebets. You can add commission if you bet in a betting exchange such as betfair, to be more precise with your calculations and save a lot of money. Also you have the option to choose the stake you want to be the base to calculate the other stakes (extremely usefull if you have a certain amount in one betting company and want to calculate the others). Finally the back-lay calculator can be used as a trading calculator (to see how you can bet to win if the odds have changed in the betting exchange). Lastly you can save all your surebets to a database and browse them later with full statistics.- Progressive Betting Calculator. This feature provides a way to progressively increase the stake for each bet to cover the loses of the previous, so theoritically you will always win BUT if you have the money to cover the previous so be carefull. All you have to do is to input the desired standard profit you want and the standard odd you bet each time.- MultiBet calculator, for calculating your multibets.- Universal odd converter (EU, US, UK)- Back/Lay converter and true odds(after deducting commission)- Fair odds(probability) calculationSO STOP GAMBLING... START INVESTING!!-Soon there will be updates with more and more features so stay tuned...For any problems or new ideas please feel free to contact me daniskoko@gmail.com-Tags: bet calculator, surebet calculator, betting, odd converter.
